actions.name: Relic Variation
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Relic Dance.

Effect: The user transforms into its Aria Forme. The user may also change Formes as either a Simple Action (4 PP), or as a Downtime Action.

actions.description: Effect: The user transforms into its Aria Forme.

actions.description: Effect: The user transforms into its Aria Forme.

actions.name: Relic Dance
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[splinter] 7 and @Affliction[confused] 7.

actions.name: Capoeira
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Kick] Attacks also have [Dance], and the user's [Dance] Attacks have their Power increased by 30%.

actions.name: Benevolent Gift
actions.description: Effect: The duration of effects caused or created by the user is increased by 2.
